Help:Node.title: Skills
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Skills
Important Commands: teach, @skills
Skills are abilities that your character possesses. Just like in real life you might be particularly skilled in fencing or in sewing or in speaking foreign languages.
{? equal | $(theatre.id) | IC | To see the skills your character knows, type the $(udat.chatchar)@SKILLS command. Teachers can aid students with the $(udat.chatchar)TEACH command: $(udat.chatchar)TEACH [STUDENT] ABOUT [SKILL].
| Although a skill system is a part of some Skotos Chat Theatres and games, it is not incorporated into $(theatre.gamebrief). }
See Also: ,
